meanings: The dried persimmon is too sweet to eat now
The dried persimmon is too sweet to eat now

vlive.korean: [방귀 소리 질색하는 투투가 귀여워서 당장 뿡뿡이 섭외하고 싶은 나 정상인가요?] [I love it when he hates the sound of the fart. I want to hire Bboongbboong-E now. Am I normal?] View video V PICK! : [PARK JI HOON] 크레이지 방귀케이드 왕초보뉴비먕먕,, 내 물풍선에 저장😉💦 (JI HOON playing the game with MAY)
vlive.english: [I love it when he hates the sound of the fart. I want to hire Bboongbboong-E now. Am I normal?]

vlive.korean: [손 당장 내려!] [Put your hand down!] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 여사친과 학교에서 키스를 해버렸다❤️ [리얼:타임:러브2] EP2
지금 당장 끊기 조금... It's hard to stop it right now. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 그냥🐺
vlive.english: It's hard to stop it right now.

vlive.korean: [당장 구름이불로 돌돌 말아 둥가둥가 해버려] 아 그래요? [I want to cover them with clouds] Really? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [이한결, 남도현] 누구인가.. 누가 야채샐러드 소리를 내었어...🥗 (HANGYUL&DOHYON talking about their dinner menu)
vlive.english: [I want to cover them with clouds] Really?

vlive.korean: [이렇게나 심도 있는 고민을 하더니 당장 아이스크림학 박사 수여하자!] [let's give him a PH. D. for ice cream!] View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 말랑콩떡이 알고보니 반짝꿀떡이었던 거예요🍡 (YUGYEOM singing PRAY)
vlive.english: [let's give him a PH. D. for ice cream!]
